So the one that I think is most applicable here is - I was taking a lot of photos with my cell phone around my house and around where I worked and where I was going out with my friends.

And when I make those photos public, somebody could sort of build up a profile over time of where I am.
Right.

And I found that to be slightly disturbing, because I'm making the choice to make the photo public without really thinking through that someone can plot on a map and figure out where I live and I work.
